about_the_game:
Call your friends and prepare to face-off in a virtual arcade showdown! These multiplayer games allow you to band together as a group to save the day, or turn on each other to see who comes out victorious!

Designed for in-person gameplay with a crowd, Ricky's Rockin’ Arcade will provide up to five unique arcade games for you to enjoy. The first game is out now, with four more coming this summer!

Try your luck in an infiltrator race through a neon landscape with your fellow hackers. Once you’ve experienced Ricky’s first game, you’ll be anxious to see what else he has in store for you!

Perfect for game nights, group hangouts, and anytime you’d rather be battling monsters than small-talk!

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
